title: Fan Art of Arcade Ahri

embed.description: Ahh I added some CG texture! Oh how I hate it when I don't spam stuff like this! xd Anyways, here's to another Arcade Ahri fan art brought to you by Uno... Sunbean Arcade Ahri

body: Hi, I wanted to send my fan art to Riot, but I don't know where to post it. I've also made some skin design for Ahri. I'll put it up later. For now this will do, thanks to the recent release! Hope you like it!

replies.body: Cool. You could try sending your art to Riot at [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Nice art. Keep up the good work!
